ValidationRule.description: After Submitted/Under Review/Approved/Declined, core profile fields cannot be edited.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Submitted to ISO"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Under Review"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Approved"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Declined") ), OR( ISCHANGED(Business_Name__c), ISCHANGED(Actual_Monthly_Volume__c), ISCHANGED(Average_Transaction__c), ISCHANGED(Product_Type__c), ISCHANGED(Primary_Contact_Name__c), ISCHANGED(Primary_Contact_Phone__c), ISCHANGED(Primary_Contact_Email__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Record is already submitted/in review. Core fields are locked.
